mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_language_info(language_id, language, type, grade, acquired_date, license_number, agency) VALUES(user_language_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{language}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{acquiredDate}, #{licenseNumber}, #{agency})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_language_info SET language = #{language}, type = #{type}, grade = #{grade}, acquired_date = #{acquiredDate}, license_number = #{licenseNumber}, agency = #{agency}
